birth_place.zh-cn: 中华民国台湾省基隆市七堵区
birth_place.en: Qidu District, Keelung City, Taiwan Province, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，民主进步党籍，曾任立法委员、台北市议员、国民大会代表。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and member of the Democratic Progressive Party, who has served as a member of the Legislative Yuan, Taipei City Councilor, and National Assembly delegate.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的主要政党之一，高嘉瑜为其党员。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan, of which Kao Chia-yu is a member.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一所顶尖研究型大学，高嘉瑜在此获得法律学士和国家发展研究所硕士学位。
description.en: A top research university in Taiwan, where Kao Chia-yu obtained her bachelor's degree in law and a master's degree from the Graduate Institute of National Development.

en: Legislator of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的国会议员职位，高嘉瑜曾于2020年至2024年担任。
description.en: The position of a member of the parliament of the Republic of China (Taiwan). Kao Chia-yu served in this role from 2020 to 2024.

description.zh-cn: 台北市的最高立法机关，高嘉瑜曾于2010年至2020年担任议员。
description.en: The highest legislative body of Taipei City, where Kao Chia-yu served as a councilor from 2010 to 2020.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国曾经的宪政机关，高嘉瑜曾于2005年当选为任务型国民大会代表。
description.en: A former constitutional body of the Republic of China. Kao Chia-yu was elected as a delegate to the ad-hoc National Assembly in 2005.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，高嘉瑜初入政坛时曾担任其特别助理。后被陈水扁提名为立委候选人以取代高嘉瑜。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician for whom Kao Chia-yu worked as a special assistant early in her political career. He was later nominated by Chen Shui-bian to replace Kao as a legislative candidate.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前总统，曾任民主进步党主席。他在2007年撤换了高嘉瑜的立委候选人提名，改由罗文嘉参选。
description.en: Former President of the Republic of China and former chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party. In 2007, he replaced Kao Chia-yu's legislative candidate nomination with Luo Wen-chia.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，中国国民党籍。在立法委员选举中与高嘉瑜互有胜负。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and member of the Kuomintang. She and Kao Chia-yu have competed against each other in Legislative Yuan elections, with each winning at different times.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾在2018年台北市长选举的造势晚会上公开批评高嘉瑜。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who publicly criticized Kao Chia-yu during a campaign rally for the 2018 Taipei mayoral election.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，前台北市市长。曾在姚文智事件中为高嘉瑜辩护，后又爆料高嘉瑜为特定诊所关说疫苗。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and former Mayor of Taipei. He once defended Kao Chia-yu during the incident with Pasuya Yao, but later accused her of lobbying for vaccines for a specific clinic.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任卫生福利部部长。高嘉瑜于2022年担任其台北市长竞选办公室副主委。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and former Minister of Health and Welfare. Kao Chia-yu served as a deputy director of his Taipei mayoral campaign office in 2022.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统，曾任民主进步党主席。在林智坚论文门事件中，要求全党公职人员支持林智坚。
description.en: President of the Republic of China and former chairperson of the Democratic Progressive Party. During the Lin Chih-chien plagiarism scandal, she called on all party officials to support Lin.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，因论文门事件而引发争议。高嘉瑜对此事的评论与党内主流意见相左。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician involved in a plagiarism scandal. Kao Chia-yu's comments on the matter diverged from the mainstream opinion within her party.

description.zh-cn: 高嘉瑜前男友，因对高嘉瑜施暴而引发社会关注。
description.en: Kao Chia-yu's ex-boyfriend, who gained public attention for assaulting her.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，在2024年立法委员选举中参选，被认为瓜分了泛绿阵营选票，导致高嘉瑜连任失败。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician whose candidacy in the 2024 Legislative Yuan election is considered to have split the pan-Green camp's vote, contributing to Kao Chia-yu's failure to be re-elected.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，前高雄市市长。高嘉瑜曾批评其阻挡罢免案的行为。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and former mayor of Kaohsiung. Kao Chia-yu criticized his actions to obstruct a recall motion against him.

description.zh-cn: 高嘉瑜大学时期结识的男友，两人交往二十余年。
description.en: Kao Chia-yu's boyfriend whom she met in college; they were in a relationship for over twenty years.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的主要政党之一，其党员李彦秀是高嘉瑜在选举中的主要竞争对手。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan. Its member, Lee Yen-hsiu, is a main political rival of Kao Chia-yu in elections.

description.zh-cn: 台湾基隆市的一个市辖区，是高嘉瑜的出生地。
description.en: A district of Keelung City, Taiwan, and the birthplace of Kao Chia-yu.

description.zh-cn: 高嘉瑜是民主进步党籍的政治人物。
description.en: Kao Chia-yu is a politician and a member of the Democratic Progressive Party.

degree.zh-cn: 法律学系学士、国家发展研究所硕士
degree.en: Bachelor of Laws, Master from the Graduate Institute of National Development

description.zh-cn: 高嘉瑜毕业于国立台湾大学法律学系，并进修获得国家发展研究所硕士学位。
description.en: Kao Chia-yu graduated from the Department of Law at National Taiwan University and obtained a master's degree from its Graduate Institute of National Development.

description.zh-cn: 高嘉瑜出生于基隆市七堵区。
description.en: Kao Chia-yu was born in Qidu District, Keelung City.

description.zh-cn: 高嘉瑜担任第10届中华民国立法委员。
description.en: Kao Chia-yu served as a legislator in the 10th Legislative Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 高嘉瑜曾连任三届台北市议员（第11至13届）。
description.en: Kao Chia-yu served three consecutive terms (11th to 13th) as a Taipei City Councilor.

description.zh-cn: 高嘉瑜于2005年当选为任务型国民大会代表。
description.en: Kao Chia-yu was elected as a delegate to the ad-hoc National Assembly in 2005.

description.zh-cn: 高嘉瑜初入政坛时曾担任罗文嘉的特别助理。
description.en: Early in her political career, Kao Chia-yu served as a special assistant to Luo Wen-chia.

description.zh-cn: 时任民进党主席的陈水扁撤换了高嘉瑜在2008年立法委员选举中的候选人资格。
description.en: Then-DPP Chairman Chen Shui-bian revoked Kao Chia-yu's candidacy for the 2008 Legislative Yuan election.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年立法委员选举中，李彦秀击败高嘉瑜，导致其连任失利。
description.en: In the 2024 Legislative Yuan election, Lee Yen-hsiu defeated Kao Chia-yu, causing her to lose her re-election bid.

description.zh-cn: 在2020年立法委员选举中，高嘉瑜击败时任立委李彦秀，成功当选。
description.en: In the 2020 Legislative Yuan election, Kao Chia-yu defeated incumbent legislator Lee Yen-hsiu to win the seat.

description.zh-cn: 吴欣岱在2024年立法委员选举中参选，严重瓜分泛绿选票，是导致高嘉瑜连任失败的因素之一。
description.en: Wu Hsin-tai's candidacy in the 2024 Legislative Yuan election severely split the pan-Green vote, which was a contributing factor to Kao Chia-yu's failure to be re-elected.

description.zh-cn: 在2018年台北市长选举的造势晚会上，姚文智暗指高嘉瑜在其发言时离开，引发支持者对高的不满。
description.en: During a rally for the 2018 Taipei mayoral election, Pasuya Yao implied that Kao Chia-yu left while he was speaking, inciting discontent among his supporters towards her.

description.zh-cn: 时任台北市长柯文哲爆料称高嘉瑜曾致电卫生局，替禾馨诊所索要85瓶疫苗。
description.en: Then-Taipei Mayor Ko Wen-je revealed that Kao Chia-yu had called the Department of Health to request 85 vials of vaccine for the Dianthus clinic.

description.zh-cn: 高嘉瑜担任台北市长候选人陈时中竞选办公室的副主委及分区总督导，为其助选。
description.en: Kao Chia-yu served as the deputy director and regional supervisor for Taipei mayoral candidate Chen Shih-chung's campaign office, supporting his election bid.

description.zh-cn: 在林智坚论文门事件中，时任党主席蔡英文下达指令，要求全体党公职人员支持林智坚捍卫其清白。
description.en: During the Lin Chih-chien plagiarism scandal, then-party chairperson Tsai Ing-wen issued an order for all party officials to support Lin in defending his innocence.

description.zh-cn: 针对林智坚论文门事件，高嘉瑜公开表示“连林智坚自己都没办法捍卫自己的清白”，与党中央要求全党力挺的立场相悖。
description.en: Regarding the Lin Chih-chien plagiarism scandal, Kao Chia-yu publicly stated that 'even Lin Chih-chien himself cannot defend his own innocence,' which contradicted the party central's position of full support.

description.zh-cn: 高嘉瑜的男友林秉枢对其施加暴力，事件引发公众广泛关注。
description.en: Kao Chia-yu's boyfriend, Lin Ping-shu, physically assaulted her, an incident that drew widespread public attention.

description.zh-cn: 高嘉瑜批评时任高雄市长韩国瑜阻挡罢免案的行为，并将其形容为“高雄金正恩”。
description.en: Kao Chia-yu criticized then-Kaohsiung Mayor Han Kuo-yu for obstructing a recall vote and described him as the 'Kim Jong-un of Kaohsiung'.

description.zh-cn: 高嘉瑜自大学一年级起与马文钰交往，两人关系持续二十余年。
description.en: Kao Chia-yu was in a relationship with Ma Wen-yu for over twenty years, starting from her freshman year of university.
